Test Name: Factor 13, Qualitative, with Reflex to Factor 13 1:1 Mix
Purpose: To qualitatively assess Factor 13 activity in plasma and detect FXIII deficiency, with reflex 1:1 mix testing when indicated.
Equipment: Factor 13 Qualitative Assay Kit, FXIII 1:1 Mix reagents, calibrated pipettes/volumetric mixers, plate reader or coagulation analyzer
